EmailTemplate.name: LE-2021-12-07-CS-Partner-Appreciation-Cheeseboard.Invite-Mercer
EmailTemplate.subject: Build a holiday cheeseboard with Teladoc Health
EmailTemplate.textOnly: JOIN OUR EVENT: Holiday Cheeseboard Styling with Teladoc Health Wednesday, December 8 4:00-5:00 PM Eastern Hi {{lead.First Name}}, We want to thank you for being a great partner to Teladoc Health! To show our gratitude for the great work we've accomplished together in 2021, we'd like to celebrate the best way we know how—with cheese. We’ll take care of everything, including shipping you all the delicious goodies you need to build and style a beautiful holiday cheeseboard. This is a family-friendly event, so feel free to include the whole house in the fun, too! If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out. We look forward to having you join us. This event is by invitation only and limited to select participants. RSVP by 11/22 to secure your spot. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Rd., Purchase, NY 10577
